Apologies for any confusion and delay in getting the March release of WPF Toolkit out. The Toolkit was originally supposed to be released Friday morning (March 20, 2009). Shortly after we posted the release, users reported that the Disabled DatePicker bug that was supposed to have been fixed actually wasn’t (thanks shallotx & Octothorpe!). When we investigated, we discovered that we made an error in porting the source code to CodePlex, which left out part of the change. The CodePlex emergency maintenance that occurred on Friday prevented us from updating the project that afternoon.

This morning we replaced the release with a new one which includes updated binaries.  Source code for this release will also be added within the next few days.  For anyone that downloaded 3.5.40319.1, which we have now removed, please upgrade to 3.5.40320.1, which contains this additional bug fix.

Thank you all for your patience and understanding,
The WPF Toolkit Team
Source code is now posted.  Thanks
